LimitedDeck

LimitedDeck constructor

LimitedDeck(
  1. {required BaseCard base,
  2. required Iterable<DeckCard> cards,
  3. required LeaderCard leader}
)

Creates a new Limited deck from the given base, leader, and cards.

Implementation

LimitedDeck({
  required super.base,
  required super.cards,
  required this.leader,
}) {
  if (cards.length < 30) {
    throw ArgumentError.value(
      cards.length,
      'cards',
      'Must have at least 30 cards.',
    );
  }
}
